# pd-card-content

## Styles

| Style                       | Default | Description                                         |
| --------------------------- | ------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| `--pd-card-content-padding` | `20px`  | horizontal and vertical padding of card content box |

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description | Type      | Default |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- | --------- | ------- |
| `collapsed` | `collapsed` |             | `boolean` | `false` |
